info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: converts SAM files into compressed BAM format using samtools sort
info.paperDescription: Samtools (%SOFTWARE_VERSION%) was used to convert SAM to BAM files [Li H, Handsaker B, Wysoker A, Fennell T, Ruan J, Homer N, Marth G, Abecasis G, Durbin R, and 1000 Genome Project Data Processing Subgroup, The Sequence alignment/map (SAM) format and SAMtools, Bioinformatics (2009) 25(16) 2078-9].

param.name: sam
param.description: path to SAM file that should be compressed

param.name: threads
param.description: number of threads to use for compression

param.name: quality
param.description: compression level; 1 is the worst/fastest and 9 is the best/slowest compression

param.name: memory
param.description: maximal memory that can be used per thread; only an estimation and might be exceeded!

param.name: tmpFolder
param.description: write temporary files to that folder

var.name: BAMFile
var.description: absolute path to the resulting BAM file
